Protocols/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourc.name: textDictionary
Protocols/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourc.abstract: This is an Array of structs, that are the searchable data collection for the text field.

Protocols/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourc.name: getTextDictionaryFromThis(string:isCaseSensitive:isWildcardBefore:isWildcardAfter:maximumAutofillCount:)
Protocols/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourc.abstract: This searches the Array, for strings that match the given String, according to the parameters included with the invocation.

Protocols/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourc.name: RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSource
Protocols/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourc.abstract: The text field class will require an instance of a class that conforms to this protocol. It will supply the data to be displayed in the autofill table.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.name: tableBackgroundColor
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.abstract: When the table comes up, this will be the color. The default is the standard system color, with a 0.25 alpha.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.name: tableTextColor
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.abstract: This is the text color to use in the table. Default is label color.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.name: minimumTableWidthInDisplayUnits
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.abstract: The minimum width of the table. It will be at least this wide, and will follow the width of the edit text item, if it is bigger.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.name: isAutoFillOn
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.abstract: This is a “circuit breaker” for the autofill capability. Default is on. If Off, the autofill will not be shown.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.name: isCaseSensitive
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.abstract: This specifies whether or not matches are case-blind (default), or case-sensitive (true).

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.name: isWildcardBefore
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.abstract: If true (default is false), then the match is made at the end of the string.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.name: isWildcardAfter
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.abstract: If true (default is true), then the match is made at the beginning of the string.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.name: maximumAutofillCount
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@M.abstract: This is the maximum number of results to be returned. Default is 5.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/s:21.name: dataSource
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/s:21.abstract: This is the data source for this widget. Be aware that this is a strong reference.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/s:21.name: tableFont
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/s:21.abstract: This is the font to use. It must be set programmatically.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/s:21.name: closeTableViewAndResignFirstResponder()
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/s:21.abstract: Called to close the table view, and, possibly, resign as first responder.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.name: becomeFirstResponder()
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.abstract: This makes sure that we remove the table, if we are no longer the focus.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.name: resignFirstResponder()
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.abstract: This makes sure that we remove the table, if we are no longer the focus.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.name: layoutSubviews()
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.abstract: Called when we trigger a layout. We use this to register our callback.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.name: removeFromSuperview()
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.abstract: Called when we are being removed from our superview. We remove the callback (just to be sure -belt and suspenders).

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.name: tableView(_:numberOfRowsInSection:)
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.abstract: This returns the number of rows to display in the autofill table.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.name: tableView(_:cellForRowAt:)
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.abstract: This returns one cell of the table, with the specific autofill suggestion.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.name: tableView(_:didSelectRowAt:)
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html#/c:@C.abstract: This reacts to the user selecting a suggested text item.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourceT.name: value
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourceT.abstract: The actual String value of this element. Comparisons will happen within this.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourceT.name: refCon
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourceT.abstract: This is an arbitrary associated data type. It can be anything, and will be associated with the String value. It should be noted that this will be a strong reference to classes.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourceT.name: RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourceType
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextFieldDataSourceT.abstract: This is what the protocol needs to provide to the widget.

Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html.name: RVS_AutofillTextField
Classes/RVS_AutofillTextField.html.abstract: This class overloads the standard UITextField widget to provide a realtime “dropdown” menu of possible autocomplete choices (in a table and modal-style screen).
